mapper.select: SELECT TCS.STI_CD AS STI_CD, TCS.STI_NM AS STI_NM, TCS.COM_CTSEC AS COM_CTSEC, TCS.COM_SCD AS COM_SCD, B.STM_HP FROM TC_STINF TCS WITH (NOLOCK), TC_STMEMBER B WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCS.COM_SCD = B.COM_SCD AND TCS.STI_CD = B.STI_CD AND TCS.COM_SCD = #{com_scd} AND TCS.K_STI_CD = #{k_sti_cd} AND TCS.STI_NM LIKE #{sti_nm} AND TCS.STI_RANK = 'Y' AND TCS.REAL_YN = 'Y' AND TCS.K_STI_CD NOT LIKE 'CJ%' AND TCS.COM_STSEC IN ('C20C', 'C20B') AND B.STM_NO = '01'

SELECT DISTINCT TCS.K_STI_CD AS K_STI_CD, ( SELECT A.STI_NM FROM TC_STINF A WITH (NOLOCk) WHERE A.COM_SCD = TCS.COM_SCD AND A.STI_CD = TCS.K_STI_CD ) AS STI_NM FROM TC_STINF TCS WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCS.COM_SCD = #{com_scd} -----변수값 AND TCS.STI_RANK = 'Y' AND TCS.REAL_YN = 'Y' AND TCS.K_STI_CD NOT LIKE 'CJ%' AND TCS.COM_STSEC IN ('C20C', 'C20B')
SELECT TCS.STI_CD AS K_STI_CD, TCS.STI_NM AS STI_NM FROM TC_STINF TCS WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCS.COM_SCD = #{com_scd} -----변수값 AND TCS.STI_RANK = 'Y' AND TCS.K_STI_CD NOT LIKE 'CJ%'
SELECT CCD_CD AS COM_SCD, CCD_NM AS COM_SCD_NM FROM TT_COMCD WITH (NOLOCk) WHERE CDX_CD = 'C16' AND CCD_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CCD_NM
SELECT CCD_CD, CCD_NM FROM TT_COMCD WITH (NOLOCk) WHERE CDX_CD = #{CDX_CD} --'C67' AND CCD_YN = 'Y' AND REF_1 = #{REF_1} --'ASRE'
